betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Wanna see how your LSC is doing but don't want to run to it or your information panel every time? Get yourself a pair of §c§o§6§oPower Goggles §rto see your energy storage straight from the HUD!

By §l§adefault§f §r§rthe goggles are §3§cunlinked §rand will monitor the amount of energy in your wireless network. 

§6§f§6§fTo link the goggles to an LSC, Right Click the controller with the goggles in your hand. Shift+Right Click§f §o§f§e§6§fair§r §6§fto unlink.

§rIf you wish to move or modify the display you can do so by opening the power goggles config menu!

[warn]Make sure to check your keybinds! There's also a keybind for toggling the power chart![/warn]
